Fries.name: Fries
steps:
fry the potatoes in the oil
season it with the seasoning

batataVada.name: Batata Vada
steps: Heat a pan with 1 tbsp oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and green chilies.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute. Then add turmeric powder and mashed potatoes.
Mix well, season with salt, and cook for 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and let it cool.
Make small balls from the potato mixture and set aside.
For the batter, mix gram flour, red chili powder, a pinch of baking soda, and salt with water to make a thick batter.
Heat oil in a deep pan. Dip the potato balls in the batter and deep fry until golden and crispy.
Serve hot with chutney or fried green chilies.

biryani.name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Fresh coriander and mint leaves (for garnish)
steps: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, biryani masala, and salt for 1 hour.
Cook the rice with whole spices until 80% done and set aside.
Heat ghee and fry onions until golden brown. Set aside half for garnish.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft, then add the marinated chicken and cook for 10 minutes.
Layer half the rice in a pot, add the chicken mixture, and top with the remaining rice.
Garnish with fried onions, coriander, and mint. Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with raita.

butterChicken.name: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for 1 hour.
Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions until golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Add tomato puree, garam masala, and red chili powder. Cook until oil separates.
Add the marinated chicken and cook for 15-20 minutes until fully done.
Stir in the cream and simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve with naan or rice.

dalTadka.name: Dal Tadka
steps: Pressure cook toor dal with turmeric powder and salt until soft.
Heat ghee and sauté cumin seeds, garlic, and onions until golden brown.
Add tomatoes and spices, and cook until the oil separates.
Pour the tempering over the cooked dal and mix well.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with rice or chapati.

dosa.name: Dosa
steps: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds separately for 6-8 hours.
Grind rice and dal to a smooth batter. Mix and ferment overnight.
Add salt to the fermented batter and stir well.
Heat a tawa, pour a ladleful of batter, and spread in a circular motion.
Cook until crispy and serve hot with chutney and sambar.

gobiManchurian.name: Gobi Manchurian
steps: Make a batter with corn flour, all-purpose flour, salt, and water. Dip the cauliflower florets in the batter and deep fry until golden.
In a separate pan, heat oil and sauté green chilies and ginger-garlic paste.
Add soy sauce, ketchup, red chili sauce, and vinegar. Cook for 2 minutes.
Toss the fried cauliflower florets in the sauce and mix well.
Serve hot, garnished with spring onions.

idli.name: Idli
steps: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds for 6-8 hours.
Grind the rice and dal to a smooth batter. Ferment overnight.
Add salt to the batter and pour into greased idli molds.
Steam for 10-12 minutes until soft and fluffy.
Serve hot with chutney and sambar.

jalebi.name: Jalebi
steps: Prepare the batter by mixing flour, corn flour, baking powder, and water. Let it ferment for 6 hours.
Make sugar syrup by boiling sugar, water, and saffron.
Heat ghee in a pan and pour the batter in a spiral shape using a piping bag.
Fry until golden and dip in sugar syrup for a few seconds.
Serve hot.

kheer.name: Kheer
steps: Boil milk in a large pot. Add washed rice and cook on low heat for 30 minutes.
Add sugar and stir until it dissolves.
Add chopped cashews, almonds, and cardamom powder.
Cook for another 10 minutes, stirring frequently.
Serve hot or chilled.

carbonara.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, cook the pancetta or bacon until crispy. Remove from heat.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Add garlic to the pan and sauté for 1 minute.
Add cooked spaghetti to the pan, then mix in the egg and cheese mixture quickly. The heat from the pasta will cook the eggs.
Stir in the crispy pancetta and season with salt and black pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

samosa.name: Samosa
steps: Mix flour, ghee, and a pinch of salt. Knead into a smooth dough and let it rest.
Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, and then mix in potatoes and peas.
Add spices and cook for a few minutes. Allow the filling to cool.
Roll out dough, cut into circles, fill with the mixture, and fold into a triangle.
Deep fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney.

paella.name: Paella
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan or paella pan. Cook chicken and chorizo until browned.
Add onion, garlic, and bell pepper. Sauté until softened.
Stir in diced tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Add rice, saffron, and chicken broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add shrimp and peas, and cook until the rice is tender and the shrimp is cooked through.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Garnish with lemon wedges and serve.

croissant.name: Croissant
steps: Mix flour, sugar, and yeast. Add warm milk and melted butter, then knead into a dough.
Let the dough rise until doubled in size.
Roll out dough and fold in chilled butter. Roll and fold several times to create layers.
Cut into triangles, roll up, and shape into croissants.
Let rise again and brush with egg wash.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 15-20 minutes until golden brown.
Cool before serving.

ceviche.name: Ceviche
steps: Marinate fish in lime juice for 2 hours until opaque.
Mix with red onion, tomato, avocado, cilantro, and jalapeño.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve chilled with tortilla chips.

dumplings.name: Chinese Dumplings
steps: Mix flour and water to make dough. Let it rest.
Combine pork, cabbage, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Roll out dough and cut into circles. Fill with pork mixture and fold.
Steam or pan-fry dumplings until cooked through.
Serve with dipping sauce.

gnocchi.name: Potato Gnocchi
steps: Boil potatoes until tender, then mash.
Mix with flour, egg, salt, and nutmeg to form dough.
Roll into logs, cut into pieces, and press with a fork.
Cook gnocchi in boiling water until they float.
Toss with melted butter and sage.

goulash.name: Hungarian Goulash
steps: Heat oil and brown beef. Set aside.
Sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add paprika, tomatoes, and beef broth. Return beef to the pot.
Simmer until beef is tender.
Add potatoes and cook until tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

chickenAdobo.name: Chicken Adobo
steps: Marinate chicken in soy sauce, vinegar, and garlic for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan and cook onions until soft.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned.
Add water, bay leaves, and peppercorns.
Simmer until chicken is tender and sauce is reduced.
Serve with rice.

moussaka.name: Moussaka
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Brush eggplant slices with olive oil and bake for 20 minutes until tender.
In a pan, cook ground beef with onion and garlic until browned.
Add tomato sauce, cinnamon, red wine, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Layer eggplant slices in a baking dish, then spread the beef mixture over them.
Top with Bechamel sauce and grated Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 30 minutes until golden and bubbly.
Cool slightly before serving.

empanadas.name: Argentinian Empanadas
steps: Mix flour, butter, and water to form a dough. Chill.
Cook beef with onion, paprika, salt, and pepper. Mix with olives and eggs.
Roll out dough and cut into circles. Fill with beef mixture and fold.
Seal edges and brush with egg wash.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20 minutes until golden.
Serve warm.

kimchi.name: Kimchi
steps: Cut cabbage and sprinkle with sea salt. Let sit for 2 hours.
Rinse cabbage and drain.
Mix sugar, ginger, garlic, red pepper flakes, and fish sauce.
Add cabbage, green onions, and carrot. Toss to coat evenly.
Pack into jars, pressing down to eliminate air.
Let ferment at room temperature for 1-2 days, then refrigerate.
Serve as a side dish.

ratatouille.name: Ratatouille
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan and cook onion and garlic until softened.
Add eggplant, zucchini, and bell pepper. Cook until tender.
Stir in tomato sauce, thyme, and basil.
Simmer for 15 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot or cold as a side dish or main course.

churros.name: Churros
steps: In a saucepan, bring water and butter to a boil.
Remove from heat and stir in flour and salt until smooth.
Beat in eggs one at a time until dough is smooth and thick.
Heat oil in a deep pan. Pipe dough into hot oil and fry until golden brown.
Combine sugar and cinnamon. Roll churros in mixture.
Serve with chocolate dipping sauce.

shawarma.name: Shawarma
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, shawarma spice mix, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until fully cooked.
Serve in pita bread with tahini sauce, pickles, and vegetables.

tacos.name: Tacos
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for topping
steps: Cook ground beef with onion and garlic until browned.
Add taco seasoning and a splash of water. Simmer until well combined.
Fill taco shells with beef mixture and top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.
Serve immediately.

pho.name: Pho
steps: Char onion and ginger in a hot pan until fragrant.
Add spices and beef broth. Simmer for 30 minutes.
Strain the broth and return to pot. Add beef slices and cook briefly.
Prepare rice noodles according to package instructions.
Serve hot broth over noodles with fresh herbs, bean sprouts, lime, chili, and fish sauce.

sushi.name: Sushi
ingredients: Wasabi and pickled ginger for serving
steps: Rinse rice until water runs clear. Cook in a rice cooker with water.
Mix rice vinegar and sugar. Stir into cooked rice and cool.
Place rice on nori sheets and add fish slices.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

babaGanoush.name: Baba Ganoush
steps: Roast eggplants until tender and charred. Cool and peel.
Blend eggplants with tahini, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, and salt.
Serve with a drizzle of olive oil and garnish with parsley.
Enjoy with pita bread or vegetables.

bruschetta.name: Bruschetta
steps: Toast baguette slices until crisp.
Mix tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Top toasted baguette slices with tomato mixture.
Serve immediately.

beefStroganoff.name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Cook beef in butter until browned. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onion, garlic, and mushrooms.
Add flour and cook for a minute.
Stir in beef broth and simmer until thickened.
Return beef to pan and stir in sour cream.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve over egg noodles or rice.

cannoli.name: Cannoli
steps: Mix ricotta, mascarpone, powdered sugar, and vanilla.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Fill cannoli shells with the mixture.
Chill before serving.

shakshuka.name: Shakshuka
steps: Sauté onion, bell pepper, and garlic in a pan.
Add tomatoes, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs are set.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with bread.

tiramisu.name: Tiramisu
steps: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until thick and pale.
Fold in mascarpone cheese.
Whip cream until stiff and fold into mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer in a dish.
Spread mascarpone mixture over ladyfingers.
Repeat layers and finish with cocoa powder.
Chill for at least 4 hours before serving.

caponata.name: Caponata
steps: Sauté eggplant, onion, and bell pepper until softened.
Add tomato sauce, vinegar, olives, capers, and sugar.
Simmer for 20 minutes until flavors meld.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve warm or cold as a side dish.

poutine.name: Poutine
steps: Cook French fries according to package instructions.
Heat beef gravy until hot.
Place fries on a plate and top with cheese curds.
Pour hot gravy over the fries and cheese.
Serve immediately.

potatoSalad.name: Potato Salad
steps: Boil potatoes until tender. Drain and cool.
Mix mayonnaise and mustard in a bowl.
Add potatoes, red onion, celery, salt, and pepper.
Gently toss to combine.
Garnish with parsley before serving.

baklava.name: Baklava
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Layer phyllo dough in a baking dish, brushing each layer with melted butter.
Sprinkle walnuts between layers.
Cut into diamond shapes and bake for 45 minutes.
Boil sugar, water, honey, vanilla, and lemon juice for 10 minutes.
Pour syrup over hot baklava.
Cool before serving.
